summary: A young Seminole Indian uses his rattlesnake to take revenge on all those he believes have wronged him.
cast: Chris Robinson|Alex Rocco|Steve Alaimo|Susan Carroll|Mark Harris|Rey Baumel|Paul Avery|Marcia Knight|Gary Crutcher|Mel Pape|Milton 'Butterball' Smith|Pamela Talus|William Marquez|Julio C. Chávez|Melanie Grefe|Charles Lawlor|Frank Weed
title: Stanley
